Name: Lollo Campaign: Navigation III
Description: On Day 3 of the Campaign, Lollo Navigator suffered an unexpected system crash. Maji needs your help to resolve the issue.
QuestDesc: On Day 3 of the Campaign, Lollo Navigator suffered an unexpected system crash. Maji needs your help to resolve the issue.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You come just in time, {PlayerName}. No time to explain. Quick, I need you to connect to "Lollo Navigator."

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's been crammed with too much data lately, and the system can't handle it, so some of the data's being corrupted.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If this thing crashes and sends out wrong information to the users, we'd be in a world of trouble.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Phew. Close one. "Lollo Navigator" would've gone haywire if you hadn't given us a hand.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This little crisis exposed a bit of a problem in the program... It's got a limited capacity for storing map information. Well, better late than never, right?

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Couldn't have done it without you, {PlayerName}. How about we call it a day? I need to go sort this thing out, pronto.
